summary: This Senate bill, S.965, aims to strengthen the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness. It amends Title II of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act. Key changes include removing a specific funding authorization amount, stating "such sums as may be necessary" for the program's operations and eliminating and renumbering certain sections of the Act. The bill was introduced by Mr. Reed and cosponsored by several senators, and was read twice and assigned to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
